articles.summary: A new artificial intelligence (AI) tool could boost health outcomes for some men with prostate cancer by identifying whether they would benefit from a promising treatment. The drug abiraterone works by blocking testosterone production throughout the body, including in the tumour. It's been shown to slash the risk of death by nearly half for about one in four men with the cancer. It can be costly and have side effects, making health authorities wary of prescribing it too readily. articles.summary: Vaniam Group has launched Vaniam Intelligence, a platform that integrates artificial intelligence with human expertise to transform how biopharma companies develop strategies and make decisions. Vaniam Group believes the most transformative innovations emerge when human expertise and cutting-edge technology work hand in hand.

articles.title: Some Gmail Users Now Will Get AI Email Summaries Automatically
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: AI summaries of messages will be turned on in certain instances. You used to have to opt in to see AI summaries, but now you can choose not to do that at all. It will be available in some instances.

articles.title: The ‘white-collar bloodbath' is all part of the AI hype machine
articles.author: system
articles.summary: AI is getting better than humans at almost all intellectual tasks and society is going to have to grapple with it, according to billionaire Dario Amodei. He thinks it's going to ruin the global economy, but when tech CEOs do the same thing, people tend to perk up.

articles.title: POLITICO, Punchbowl News, AIScoop, Cipher Brief, Foreign Policy, Foreign Affairs and Salem Media Partner with SCSP's AI+ Expo
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: The Special Competitive Studies Project (SCSP) announced new and returning media partners for their second AI+ Expo, scheduled for June 2-4, 2025 in the Washington, D.C. SCSP is dedicated to strengthening America's long-term competitiveness in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Amazon Taps Into The New York TImes Content to Power Alexa and AI Tools
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Amazon has permission to use content from The New York Times across its artificial intelligence (AI) systems, including Alexa. Amazon has announced it now has permission for use of the content from the Times across all its AI systems. Amazon's Alexa has access to the Times content.

articles.title: I tried Reddit Answers – Reddit's new AI tool is helpful, but it misses what ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Reddit's new AI tool pulls together quick answers from across Reddit's different sub-subreddits. Will it strip away the platform's unique charm, as some fear it will do?   iReport.com: Do you know any Reddit users who might benefit from the new tool?

articles.title: How AI is influencing the future of luxury fashion
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: A couple of years ago, around the dawn of Covid-19, there was an intense conversation about Artificial Intelligence's potential to transform various industries. As the world adjusted to reduced human interaction and fewer in-person experiences, AI is both essential and essential.

articles.title: Judge Hears Final Arguments on How to Fix Google's Search Monopoly
articles.author: New York Times
articles.summary: A judge is expected to make a decision by August. He asked lawyers during closing arguments on Friday about how A.I. should factor into his decision, which is expected by August, about how it should be treated by the judge. The judge will decide on the matter then.

articles.title: Inside Look at OpenAI's $500 Billion Stargate Megafactory in Abilene
articles.summary: The episode of Bloomberg's The Circuit has surpassed 2.4 million views. Chang explores the project of OpenAI's $500 billion Stargate Megafactory in Abilene, Texas. The episode includes a walkthrough of the facility and a discussion on the impact of AI on jobs.
